name: Dar Zemora

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from this house in the palmerie marrakech, It is a piece of heaven. We stayed in the Zahara suite and it was wonderful just the perfect location. The service is of the highest standard with no exeptions , the food wonderful this was our second visit, look forward to the next .
reviews.title: beautiful retreat

reviews.text: Wonderful, peaceful, immaculately decorated boutique hotel outside the city centre. We stayed in the pavilion, which was excellent value for money and extremely luxurious. After one small hitch with our airport pick-up everything else went really well with our stay and the staff were very gracious. Good food in an exquisite dining space. A great place to stay if you don't want to immerse yourself in the chaos of the medina, but still possible to 'commute' in by taxi when you want to.
reviews.title: Delectable and delightful Dar Zarmora
What a wonderful team
reviews.text: If you're looking for tranquility, sublime surroundings and staff which, by the time you leave you could almost count as your best friends - then spend a few nights at Dar Zamora.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I was incredibly fortunate to have the Dar Zamora to myself for 4 days - treated like an absolute princess I had the time of my life. I class one of my favourite hobbies as visiting boutique hotels around the world and Tatler and Conde Nast have it spot on - this place is simply devine - close enough to shop in the Medina and trendy Sidi Ghamm yet far enough to remove the stresses and strains of what may be on your shoulders when you arrive.
reviews.title: Beautiful and Perfect (especially the service!)

likes.liked: — The peaceful atmosphere and beautiful decoration

description: Situated in the Palmeraie area of Marrakech and set within 1 hectare of gardens. Large swimming pool. Traditionally built with some contempory features. Great space for a maximum of 14 guests. Many sitting rooms, Dining Room and Hamman on site. 4 Suites, 3 bedrooms.
